a.n: The Amazing World of Gumball I

p.k: The Curse / The Microwave / The Meddler / The Helmet Gumball experiences an impossibly unfortunate chain of events. / Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Gumball is embarrassed when Mum comes to school to spend some “quality time”. / Gumball’s magic tinfoil helmet threatens to tear the Watterson family apart!
